post.text: With just days to go until the election, Republicans are pulling out all the stops to try to bring Hillary down. Share this to help set the record straight and get out the facts.

comment.author: Conrad
comment.text: The FBI should be investigating Trump's relationship with Putin.

replies.author: Cassidy
replies.text: You are out of your mind. He has no relationship with Putin.

replies.author: Jaymie
replies.text: How about the uranium sell to the Russians approved by Hillary? Let's investigate that as well.

replies.author: Conrad
replies.text: Cassidy According to his own son, Donald Jr., "Russians make up a pretty disproportionate cross-section of a lot of our assets," ... Published in the Washington Post...
